name: Spaghetti Carbonara
description: Italian pasta dish with creamy egg sauce
instructions: 1. Cook the pasta: Fill a large pot with water, add a pinch of salt, and bring it to a boil. Add the spaghetti to the boiling water and cook according to package instructions until al dente, about 8–10 minutes. 2. Prepare the egg and cheese mixture: While the pasta is cooking, crack the eggs into a medium bowl. Add the grated Parmesan cheese and whisk together until smooth and well-combined, forming a creamy mixture. Set aside. 3. Cook the bacon: Place a large skillet over medium heat. Cut the bacon into small pieces and add it to the hot skillet. Sauté until the bacon is crispy and the fat has rendered out, about 5 minutes. Reduce the heat and set the skillet aside so the bacon doesn't burn. 4. Reserve pasta water: When the spaghetti is al dente, scoop out about 1/2 cup of the pasta cooking water and set it aside. Drain the spaghetti but do not rinse it, as the starch on the pasta will help bind the sauce. 5. Combine pasta and bacon: Transfer the drained spaghetti to the skillet with the bacon. Toss to combine, allowing the pasta to be coated with the bacon fat. The residual heat from the skillet and pasta will help to gently cook the sauce in the next step. 6. Add the egg and cheese mixture: Remove the skillet from heat. Pour the egg and cheese mixture over the hot spaghetti, quickly tossing to coat the pasta evenly. The eggs should gently cook in the heat of the pasta, creating a creamy sauce. If the sauce is too thick, add a bit of the reserved pasta water to reach the desired consistency. 7. Season to taste: Add freshly ground black pepper to taste. Additional salt may not be necessary as the bacon and Parmesan are already salty. 8. Serve: Serve the Spaghetti Carbonara immediately, garnishing with extra Parmesan if desired.
ingredients: 200 g spaghetti, 2 large eggs, 100 g bacon, 50 g Parmesan cheese, 1 tsp black pepper
creator: RecipeFinder

name: Chicken Curry
description: Spicy and creamy chicken curry with coconut milk
instructions: 1. Prepare ingredients: Chop the chicken breast into bite-sized pieces. Finely chop the onion and garlic. 2. Sauté aromatics: In a large skillet or pot, heat a tablespoon of oil over medium heat. Add the chopped onion and garlic and sauté until they become translucent, about 3–4 minutes. 3. Cook chicken with spices: Add the chicken pieces to the skillet. Sprinkle the curry powder over the chicken and stir well to coat evenly. Cook for 5–7 minutes, or until the chicken is browned on all sides. 4. Add coconut milk: Pour in the coconut milk and stir to combine. Bring the mixture to a simmer and let it cook for about 10–15 minutes, allowing the chicken to become tender and the flavors to meld together. Stir occasionally. 5. Adjust seasoning and serve: Taste the curry and adjust salt or spices if needed. Serve hot with rice or naan.
ingredients: 300 g chicken breast, 2 tbsp curry powder, 400 ml coconut milk, 1 whole onion, 2 cloves garlic
creator: RecipeFinder

name: Veggie Stir Fry
description: Quick stir fry with fresh vegetables and soy sauce
instructions: 1. Prepare vegetables: Chop the broccoli, slice the carrot, and cut the bell pepper into thin strips. 2. Heat oil: In a large skillet or wok, heat a tablespoon of oil over high heat. 3. Stir-fry vegetables: Add the vegetables to the hot skillet and stir-fry for 5–6 minutes until they are tender but still slightly crisp. 4. Add soy sauce: Pour in the soy sauce and stir well, allowing it to coat the vegetables evenly. Cook for another 1–2 minutes. 5. Garnish and serve: Sprinkle sesame seeds on top before serving. Enjoy hot over rice or noodles.
ingredients: 100 g broccoli, 1 whole carrot, 1 whole bell pepper, 2 tbsp soy sauce, 1 tsp sesame seeds
creator: RecipeFinder

name: Beef Tacos
description: Beef tacos with lettuce, cheese, and salsa
instructions: 1. Prepare toppings: Shred the lettuce and grate the cheese. 2. Cook beef: In a large skillet over medium-high heat, add the ground beef and cook until browned, breaking it up with a spatula as it cooks. 3. Season beef: Add salt, pepper, or any taco seasoning you prefer, and cook for another 2–3 minutes. 4. Assemble tacos: Warm the taco shells, then add a spoonful of cooked beef to each shell. Top with shredded lettuce, grated cheese, and a spoonful of salsa. Serve immediately.
ingredients: 200 g ground beef, 4 whole taco shells, 1 cup lettuce, 100 g cheese, 50 g salsa
creator: RecipeFinder

name: Margherita Pizza
description: Classic pizza with tomato, mozzarella, and basil
instructions: 1. Preheat oven to 220°C (430°F). 2. Prepare dough: Roll out the pizza dough on a floured surface to your desired thickness. Place it on a baking sheet or pizza stone. 3. Spread sauce: Spoon tomato sauce over the dough, spreading it evenly but leaving a border for the crust. 4. Add toppings: Tear the mozzarella into pieces and scatter them over the sauce. Place basil leaves on top. 5. Bake: Place the pizza in the oven and bake for 12–15 minutes, or until the crust is golden and the cheese is melted and bubbly. 6. Slice and serve hot.
ingredients: 1 whole pizza dough, 100 ml tomato sauce, 150 g mozzarella, 10 leaves basil
creator: RecipeFinder

name: Salmon Teriyaki
description: Pan-seared salmon with sweet teriyaki glaze
instructions: 1. Prepare salmon: Pat the salmon fillet dry with paper towels. Season lightly with salt and pepper. 2. Sear salmon: In a non-stick skillet, heat a tablespoon of oil over medium-high heat. Add the salmon, skin side down, and cook for 3–4 minutes, until the skin is crispy. Flip and cook for another 2–3 minutes. 3. Add teriyaki sauce: Pour the teriyaki sauce over the salmon. Lower the heat to medium and simmer for another 2–3 minutes, allowing the sauce to thicken slightly. 4. Serve: Sprinkle sesame seeds on top and serve immediately with rice or vegetables.
ingredients: 200 g salmon fillet, 50 ml teriyaki sauce, 1 tbsp sesame seeds
creator: RecipeFinder

name: Mushroom Risotto
description: Creamy risotto with mushrooms and parmesan cheese
instructions: 1. Prepare ingredients: Finely chop the onion and garlic. Slice the mushrooms. 2. Sauté aromatics: In a large pot, melt a tablespoon of butter over medium heat. Add the chopped onion and garlic and cook until translucent, about 3 minutes. 3. Cook mushrooms: Add the mushrooms and cook until they are soft and release their moisture, about 5 minutes. 4. Toast rice: Add the arborio rice to the pot, stirring to coat it in the butter. Cook for 1–2 minutes until the rice becomes slightly translucent. 5. Add liquid gradually: Add a ladleful of warm broth and stir until absorbed. Continue adding broth, one ladle at a time, stirring constantly until the rice is creamy and tender. This takes about 18–20 minutes. 6. Finish with cheese: Stir in grated Parmesan and season with salt and pepper to taste. Serve hot.
ingredients: 200 g arborio rice, 150 g mushrooms, 50 g parmesan, 1 whole onion, 2 cloves garlic
creator: RecipeFinder

name: Classic Cheeseburger
description: Juicy beef burger with cheddar and pickles
instructions: 1. Prepare beef patty: Shape the ground beef into a patty, seasoning with salt and pepper on both sides. 2. Cook the patty: In a skillet over medium-high heat, cook the patty for 4–5 minutes on each side or until it reaches your desired level of doneness. 3. Add cheese: Place a slice of cheddar on the patty during the last minute of cooking and cover the skillet to melt the cheese. 4. Assemble the burger: Place the cooked patty with cheese on the bottom half of the bun. Add pickles on top, then cover with the other half of the bun. Serve immediately.
ingredients: 200 g ground beef, 2 slices cheddar, 2 whole pickles, 2 whole burger buns
creator: RecipeFinder

name: Caesar Salad
description: Classic salad with romaine lettuce, croutons, and Caesar dressing
instructions: 1. Prepare ingredients: Chop or tear the romaine lettuce and tomatoes into bite-sized pieces. 2. Toss with dressing: In a large bowl, add the lettuce and Caesar dressing. Toss until the leaves are evenly coated. 3. Add toppings: Sprinkle croutons and grated Parmesan over the salad. Toss gently to combine. Serve immediately.
ingredients: 100 g romaine lettuce, 100 g cherry tomatoes, 50 g croutons, 2 tbsp Caesar dressing, 30 g parmesan
creator: RecipeFinder

name: Pancakes
description: Fluffy pancakes with maple syrup
instructions: 1. Prepare batter: In a large mixing bowl, whisk together flour, sugar, and baking powder. In a separate bowl, beat eggs with milk. Pour the wet ingredients into the dry ingredients and mix until just combined. 2. Cook pancakes: Heat a non-stick skillet over medium heat and lightly grease it. Pour a small amount of batter onto the skillet to form a pancake. Cook until bubbles form on the surface, then flip and cook the other side until golden. 3. Serve: Serve pancakes warm with maple syrup or toppings of choice.
ingredients: 200 g flour, 2 large eggs, 200 ml milk, 50 g sugar, 1 tsp baking powder
creator: RecipeFinder

name: Grilled Cheese Sandwich
description: Grilled cheese with crispy bread and melted cheese
instructions: 1. Prepare bread: Butter one side of each bread slice. Place a slice of cheese between the unbuttered sides of the bread. 2. Grill sandwich: In a skillet over medium heat, place the sandwich butter-side down. Grill until golden brown, about 2–3 minutes, then flip and cook the other side until the cheese is melted and bread is crispy. Serve hot.
ingredients: 2 slices bread, 1 tbsp butter, 2 slices cheese
creator: RecipeFinder

name: Tomato Basil Soup
description: Creamy tomato soup with fresh basil
instructions: 1. Prepare ingredients: Roughly chop tomatoes and garlic. 2. Cook tomatoes: In a pot, heat a tablespoon of oil over medium heat. Add garlic and cook until fragrant, then add tomatoes and basil leaves. 3. Simmer: Pour in enough water or broth to cover the tomatoes. Simmer for 15–20 minutes until tomatoes are soft. 4. Blend and season: Use an immersion blender to blend until smooth. Stir in cream and adjust seasoning. Serve warm.
ingredients: 400 g tomatoes, 10 leaves basil, 100 ml cream, 2 cloves garlic
creator: RecipeFinder

name: Shrimp Scampi
description: Shrimp in a garlic butter sauce over pasta
instructions: 1. Prepare ingredients: Mince the garlic and pat shrimp dry. 2. Cook pasta: Boil pasta according to package instructions. Drain and set aside. 3. Sauté shrimp: In a large skillet, melt butter over medium heat. Add garlic and cook for 1–2 minutes until fragrant. Add shrimp and cook until pink and opaque, about 3–4 minutes. 4. Combine with pasta: Add cooked pasta to the skillet and toss to coat. Serve hot.
ingredients: 200 g shrimp, 3 cloves garlic, 50 g butter, 200 g pasta
creator: RecipeFinder

name: Stuffed Bell Peppers
description: Bell peppers stuffed with rice, beef, and cheese
instructions: 1. Prepare peppers: Cut the tops off the bell peppers and remove seeds. 2. Cook beef: In a skillet, cook ground beef with chopped onion until browned. Stir in cooked rice and cheese. Season to taste. 3. Stuff peppers: Fill each bell pepper with the beef and rice mixture. 4. Bake: Place stuffed peppers in a baking dish and bake at 180°C (350°F) for 25–30 minutes or until peppers are tender. Serve hot.
ingredients: 4 whole bell peppers, 100 g rice, 200 g ground beef, 50 g cheese, 1 whole onion
creator: RecipeFinder

name: Beef Stew
description: Slow-cooked beef stew with carrots and potatoes
instructions: 1. Prepare ingredients: Cut beef into chunks, and chop carrots and potatoes. 2. Brown beef: In a large pot, heat oil over medium-high heat. Brown beef on all sides, then remove from pot. 3. Cook vegetables: Add carrots, potatoes, and chopped onion to the pot, cooking until slightly softened. 4. Simmer: Add beef back to the pot along with broth and thyme. Cover and simmer on low heat for 1.5–2 hours until meat and vegetables are tender. Season and serve.
ingredients: 500 g beef, 3 whole carrots, 2 whole potatoes, 500 ml broth, 1 tsp thyme
creator: RecipeFinder

name: Vegetable Lasagna
description: Layered lasagna with vegetables and ricotta
instructions: 1. Prepare ingredients: Cook lasagna noodles according to package instructions. Chop spinach and mix with ricotta. 2. Layer lasagna: In a baking dish, spread marinara sauce. Add a layer of noodles, ricotta mixture, and vegetables. Repeat layers until ingredients are used up, finishing with a layer of sauce and cheese on top. 3. Bake: Bake in a preheated oven at 180°C (350°F) for 30–40 minutes or until bubbly and golden. Serve hot.
ingredients: 200 g lasagna noodles, 200 g ricotta, 100 g spinach, 200 ml marinara sauce
creator: RecipeFinder

name: Chicken Alfredo
description: Creamy pasta with chicken and Alfredo sauce
instructions: 1. Prepare chicken: Cut chicken into bite-sized pieces and season with salt and pepper. 2. Cook chicken: In a skillet over medium heat, cook chicken until browned and cooked through. 3. Cook pasta: Meanwhile, cook fettuccine according to package instructions. Drain and set aside. 4. Combine: Add Alfredo sauce to the skillet with the chicken. Stir in the cooked pasta until everything is coated. Serve hot.
ingredients: 300 g chicken breast, 200 ml Alfredo sauce, 200 g fettuccine
creator: RecipeFinder

name: Tuna Salad
description: Simple tuna salad with mayo and celery
instructions: 1. Prepare ingredients: Drain tuna and chop celery into small pieces. 2. Mix: In a bowl, combine tuna, mayonnaise, and celery. Stir well to combine. 3. Season: Add salt and pepper to taste. Serve chilled or at room temperature.
ingredients: 150 g tuna, 2 tbsp mayonnaise, 1 whole celery stalk
creator: RecipeFinder

name: Eggplant Parmesan
description: Breaded eggplant with marinara sauce and mozzarella
instructions: 1. Prepare eggplant: Slice eggplant into rounds. Season and dredge each slice in flour, dip in beaten eggs, then coat with breadcrumbs. 2. Fry eggplant: In a skillet, heat oil over medium heat. Fry eggplant slices until golden brown, about 2–3 minutes per side. 3. Layer and bake: In a baking dish, spread marinara sauce, add a layer of eggplant, and sprinkle with mozzarella and Parmesan. Repeat until all ingredients are used. 4. Bake: Bake at 180°C (350°F) for 20–25 minutes or until cheese is melted and bubbly. Serve hot.
ingredients: 1 large eggplant, 200 ml marinara sauce, 150 g mozzarella, 30 g parmesan
creator: RecipeFinder

name: Chocolate Brownies
description: Rich and fudgy chocolate brownies
instructions: 1. Prepare ingredients: Melt butter and chocolate together in a microwave or on the stove, stirring until smooth. Let it cool slightly. 2. Mix batter: In a bowl, whisk eggs and sugar until smooth. Stir in melted chocolate mixture, then fold in flour until just combined. 3. Bake: Pour batter into a greased baking pan and bake at 180°C (350°F) for 20–25 minutes, or until a toothpick comes out with moist crumbs. Let cool before slicing. Serve as is or with a scoop of ice cream.
ingredients: 200 g chocolate, 100 g flour, 100 g butter, 100 g sugar, 2 large eggs
creator: RecipeFinder

name: Beef and Mushroom Stroganoff
description: Creamy beef stroganoff with mushrooms and onions
instructions: 1. Prepare beef: Cut beef into strips, season with salt and pepper. 2. Brown beef: In a skillet over medium heat, brown the beef strips, then remove and set aside. 3. Sauté vegetables: In the same skillet, add chopped onions and sliced mushrooms, cooking until soft. 4. Combine: Add the beef back to the skillet, stir in sour cream, mustard, and beef broth. Simmer until sauce thickens and is creamy. Serve over cooked egg noodles.
ingredients: 400 g beef strips, 1 whole onion, 200 g mushrooms, 100 ml sour cream, 1 tbsp mustard, 200 ml beef broth
creator: RecipeFinder

name: Lemon Herb Chicken
description: Juicy chicken thighs roasted with lemon and herbs
instructions: 1. Prepare marinade: In a bowl, mix lemon juice, minced garlic, rosemary, and olive oil. 2. Marinate chicken: Coat chicken thighs in the marinade and let sit for 5 minutes. 3. Roast: Place chicken in a baking dish and roast in a preheated oven at 200°C (400°F) for 30 minutes or until golden and cooked through. Serve hot.
ingredients: 4 whole chicken thighs, 2 whole lemons, 3 cloves garlic, 1 tbsp rosemary, 2 tbsp olive oil
creator: RecipeFinder

name: Pasta Primavera
description: Fresh pasta primavera with seasonal vegetables
instructions: 1. Cook pasta: Boil pasta until al dente according to package instructions, then drain. 2. Sauté vegetables: In a skillet, sauté sliced bell pepper, zucchini, and carrot until tender. 3. Combine: Toss the pasta with vegetables, season with salt and pepper, and garnish with grated parmesan. Serve warm.
ingredients: 200 g pasta, 1 whole bell pepper, 1 whole zucchini, 1 whole carrot, 50 g parmesan
creator: RecipeFinder

name: Sweet Potato Casserole
description: Sweet potato casserole with marshmallow topping
instructions: 1. Prepare sweet potatoes: Peel and boil sweet potatoes until tender, then mash with butter, sugar, and cinnamon. 2. Add topping: Spread mashed sweet potatoes in a baking dish, top with marshmallows. 3. Bake: Bake at 180°C (350°F) for 15–20 minutes or until marshmallows are golden. Serve warm.
ingredients: 4 whole sweet potatoes, 50 g butter, 50 g sugar, 1 tsp cinnamon, 100 g marshmallows
creator: RecipeFinder

name: Lentil Dahl
description: Creamy, spiced lentil dahl with coconut milk
instructions: 1. Cook lentils: In a pot, boil lentils in water until soft. 2. Add spices: Stir in turmeric, cumin, and salt to taste. 3. Blend and finish: Add coconut milk and blend until creamy and smooth. Serve hot with rice or naan.
ingredients: 200 g lentils, 1 can coconut milk, 1 tbsp turmeric, 1 tbsp cumin
creator: RecipeFinder

name: Stuffed Zucchini Boats
description: Baked zucchini boats stuffed with a flavorful mixture
instructions: 1. Prepare zucchinis: Cut zucchinis in half lengthwise and scoop out the center. 2. Make filling: In a skillet, cook ground meat with chopped onion and diced tomato until browned. 3. Stuff and bake: Fill each zucchini boat with the mixture, top with cheese, and bake at 180°C (350°F) for 15–20 minutes. Serve warm.
ingredients: 4 whole zucchini, 200 g ground meat, 1 whole onion, 100 g cheese, 1 whole tomato
creator: RecipeFinder

name: Chili Lime Shrimp Tacos
description: Spicy shrimp tacos with a zesty lime slaw
instructions: 1. Season shrimp: Toss shrimp with chili powder and lime juice. 2. Cook shrimp: In a skillet, cook shrimp until pink, about 3–4 minutes. 3. Assemble tacos: Serve shrimp in tortillas with shredded cabbage slaw and slices of avocado. Serve immediately.
ingredients: 4 whole taco shells, 300 g shrimp, 1 tbsp chili powder, 1 whole lime, 1 half cabbage, 1 whole avocado
creator: RecipeFinder

name: Roasted Red Pepper Hummus
description: Smooth and smoky hummus with roasted red pepper
instructions: 1. Blend ingredients: In a food processor, blend chickpeas, tahini, lemon juice, garlic, and roasted red pepper until smooth. 2. Serve: Adjust seasoning if needed and serve with pita or fresh veggies.
ingredients: 1 can chickpeas, 2 tbsp tahini, 1 whole lemon, 2 cloves garlic, 1 whole roasted red pepper
creator: RecipeFinder

name: Maple Glazed Carrots
description: Tender carrots glazed in maple syrup and herbs
instructions: 1. Steam carrots: Steam carrots until slightly tender. 2. Glaze: Toss carrots with maple syrup and rosemary. 3. Bake: Place in a baking dish and bake at 180°C (350°F) for 15–20 minutes until caramelized. Serve as a side dish.
ingredients: 500 g carrots, 2 tbsp maple syrup, 1 tbsp rosemary
creator: RecipeFinder

name: Basil Pesto Pasta
description: Simple pasta tossed in fresh basil pesto
instructions: 1. Cook pasta: Boil pasta until al dente according to package instructions, then drain. 2. Combine: Toss the pasta with basil pesto and sprinkle with pine nuts. Serve warm.
ingredients: 200 g pasta, 100 g basil pesto, 20 g pine nuts
creator: RecipeFinder

name: Garlic Herb Roasted Potatoes
description: Golden potatoes roasted with garlic and herbs
instructions: 1. Prepare potatoes: Slice potatoes into wedges. 2. Season: Toss with minced garlic, rosemary, olive oil, salt, and pepper. 3. Roast: Bake at 200°C (400°F) for 25–30 minutes or until crispy and golden brown. Serve hot.
ingredients: 500 g potatoes, 3 cloves garlic, 2 tbsp rosemary, 2 tbsp olive oil
creator: RecipeFinder

name: Beef Bulgogi
description: Savory Korean BBQ beef bulgogi
instructions: 1. Marinate beef: In a bowl, combine soy sauce, minced garlic, and sugar. Add beef slices and let marinate for at least 10 minutes. 2. Cook: In a skillet over high heat, stir-fry the marinated beef until caramelized, about 5–7 minutes. Serve with rice.
ingredients: 400 g beef, 2 tbsp soy sauce, 2 cloves garlic, 1 tbsp sugar
creator: RecipeFinder

name: Tofu Stir Fry
description: Colorful stir fry with tofu and vegetables
instructions: 1. Prepare tofu: Marinate tofu in soy sauce. 2. Stir-fry: In a hot skillet, cook tofu until crispy, then add sliced bell pepper and zucchini, stir-frying until vegetables are tender. Serve hot.
ingredients: 200 g tofu, 1 whole bell pepper, 1 whole zucchini, 1 tbsp soy sauce
creator: RecipeFinder

name: Pumpkin Spice Pancakes
description: Fluffy pumpkin pancakes with warm spices
instructions: 1. Prepare batter: In a bowl, mix flour, cinnamon, pumpkin spice, and pumpkin purée. 2. Cook pancakes: Heat a griddle over medium heat, pour batter to form pancakes, and cook until bubbles form. Flip and cook until golden. Serve with syrup.
ingredients: 200 g flour, 1 tsp cinnamon, 1 tsp pumpkin spice, 200 g pumpkin purée
creator: RecipeFinder

name: Chocolate Avocado Mousse
description: Rich chocolate mousse with avocado for creaminess
instructions: 1. Blend ingredients: In a blender, combine avocado, cocoa powder, maple syrup, and vanilla extract. 2. Chill: Pour into serving cups and refrigerate for at least 30 minutes before serving.
ingredients: 1 whole avocado, 2 tbsp cocoa powder, 1 tbsp maple syrup, 1 tsp vanilla extract
creator: RecipeFinder

name: Butternut Squash Risotto
description: Creamy risotto with roasted butternut squash
instructions: 1. Roast squash: Cube and roast butternut squash at 200°C (400°F) for 20 minutes. 2. Cook risotto: In a pot, cook risotto rice with broth, stirring until creamy. 3. Combine: Add roasted squash and grated Parmesan, stirring until well combined. Serve hot.
ingredients: 200 g risotto rice, 200 g butternut squash, 50 g parmesan, 500 ml broth
creator: RecipeFinder

name: Shakshuka
description: Eggs poached in a spicy tomato sauce
instructions: 1. Sauté onions and garlic: In a skillet, cook chopped onions and garlic until softened. 2. Add spices and tomatoes: Add diced bell pepper, tomatoes, and paprika. Simmer for 10 minutes. 3. Poach eggs: Make small wells in the sauce, crack eggs into them, and cover until eggs are set. Serve warm with crusty bread.
ingredients: 4 whole eggs, 1 can tomatoes, 1 whole onion, 1 whole bell pepper, 1 tbsp paprika
creator: RecipeFinder
